item.title: Doorphone opener Zintercom
item.description: Board v2 available at GitHub Today I want to share with you the history of the development of a device for controlling a multi-apartment intercom using the Zigbee protocol. Once upon a time I had an automatic doorphone opener based on: ESP8266, a module for two relays (16A) and a transistor with a strapping. All this was collected on a bunch of wires and snot made of hot melt glue and looked something like the second photo.
